Replying to @Skeeec 2019-03-08 14:23
@Skeeec Sure. If your site has an active split test, as a user hits our ADN, the ADN will set a cookie in the client called nf_ab which has a random number between 0 & 1. This cookie will tell our ADN how send traffic between the branches in the A/B test. Also: https://t.co/P9wtsHwzzK
